attributes.action: Oppose the choice of Tony Blair to the new presidency of the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony Blair is tainted goods.
He does not hold elected office and has no prospect of doing so.
His appointment would reopen an old wound in British politics.
His appointment would increase opposition to the EU because it would defy public opinion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
